title: Privacy Policy

s1.title: 1. Introduction
s1.content: Cao (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") respects user privacy and is committed to protecting personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle personal information in the Service.

s2.title: 2. Information We Collect
s2.content:
We may collect the following information:
- Account information (email address, display name)
- Uploaded facial images
- Usage history, access logs
- Device information, browser information

s3.title: 3. Purpose of Use
s3.content:
Collected information is used for the following purposes:
- Providing the face simulation service
- Managing user accounts
- Service improvement and development
- Responding to inquiries

s4.title: 4. Image Data Handling
s4.content: Uploaded facial images are used solely for simulation processing. Original images are automatically deleted from the server after processing. Generated simulation images are not stored on the server unless the user explicitly saves them (by pressing the save button).

s5.title: 5. Information Sharing
s5.content:
We do not sell, rent, or share users' personal information with third parties, except in the following cases:
- With user consent
- When required by law
- When necessary for service-related business operations

s6.title: 6. Data Protection
s6.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect user data, including data encryption, access controls, and regular security audits.

s7.title: 7. Use of Cookies
s7.content: The Service uses cookies to improve user experience. You may disable cookies through your browser settings, but some features may be limited.

s8.title: 8. User Rights
s8.content:
Users have the following rights regarding their personal information:
- Right to request disclosure
- Right to request correction or deletion
- Right to request cessation of use

Please contact support@cao.app for these requests.

s9.title: 9. Consent Storage
s9.content: Records of agreement to the Terms of Service are stored in local storage. These records are used solely to confirm service usage status.

s10.title: 10. Policy Changes
s10.content: This Privacy Policy may be changed as necessary. We will notify you of significant changes through the Service.

s11.title: 11. Contact
s11.content:
For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at:

Email: support@cao.app
